defaultOpen.description: Use the default-open prop to open all items by default. Works better when the multiple prop is set to true.
defaultOpen.description_zh: 默认情况下，使用 default-open 属性打开所有项目。当 multiple prop 设置为 true 时效果更好。

multiple.description: Use the multiple prop to to allow multiple elements to be opened at the same time.
multiple.description_zh: 使用 multiple 属性允许同时打开多个元素。

slots.name: default
slots.description: Use the #default slot to customize the trigger buttons. You will have access to the item, index, open properties and close method in the slot scope.
slots.description_zh: 使用#default插槽自定义触发按钮。您将有权访问插槽范围内的项目、索引、打开属性和关闭方法。

slots.name: item
slots.description: Use the #item slot to customize the items content or pass a slot property to customize a specific item. You will have access to the item, index, open properties and close method in the slot scope.
slots.description_zh: 使用#item插槽自定义项目内容或传递一个插槽属性来自定义特定项目。您将有权访问插槽范围内的项目、索引、打开属性和关闭方法。
